name: Orbit (itch) (Nuubletz)
description:
Q - Select Moon 

W - Select Sun 

E - Select Sun and Moon 

D - Rotate Right 

A - Rotate Left

 F - Flip perspective

Control the Sun and Moon to help your villagers to build a village! Use the sun to create rain clouds and grow trees. Use the moon to cause the clouds to rain. Help your villagers cut down trees and build the village!
